titles.title: To establish prospective standards effective January 20, 2017 defining impeachable "high crimes and misdemeanors" within the meaning of Article II, section 4 as applied to the President of the United States to provide fair warning and evenhandedness in the administration of the impeachment power of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
